text: Fifth day of the marathon! I congratulate you, this is already a great achievement. Agree?
Sixth day of the marathon! A great day to learn English.
The seventh day! Congratulations, my dear. This is a great achievement.
The eighth day of the marathon. I'm still on a horse, and you're still in English. Unbelievable!
Ninth day of the marathon! I'm proud of you my dear
Tenth day of the marathon! Congratulations, my dear. That's enough days to praise yourself!

text: Thirteen day of the marathon. Special day for you! Today will be the week you study English with the Queen

text: The fourteenth day of the marathon. How do you like my dogs?
